text:
Message 274 of 4024
Yes, makes sense. No need to set up a couch move.
Or
Yes to set up another move to get it to the garage?
I’ll spend some time mapping out all the details as I understand. And the logistics to tonight. Then we can go over it together. Then we can decide if
we want to fill holes with CL or Fernish or whatever we find.
Then we can say “let’s both budget $ for mutual xyz and stay in each other’s ball park. Example: Sitting Room- Mine will double as an office. But I’m
not going to dupe yours now. That would be nuts.
Or... if we see something we love and must have that is beyond a shared budget, then perhaps we tell each other and say “ok, get whatever you want,
but it’s your 50/50 later”. But that is earmarked as a spend.
I don’t think either of us would do that without knowing if the next 20 years we are both living in  separate but duplicate lives in our own 1.3k square
foot apartment. But we may. This is tough for sure.
